definition: congratulate an elderly person on his birthday/offer birthday felicitations

sentences.english: I come especially to congratulate Grandpa on his birthday.
sentences.chinese: 今天我是特地來給爺爺拜壽的。

sentences.english: Life Church located in the main hall, is where the line Offering Felicitation ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 壽堂設在正廳，是行拜壽禮的地方。
